hero.title: Get to know Leap Chanvuthy

textAnimated.text1: I am a Full-stack developer based in Phnom Penh.

hero.subtitle: I am a fresh gratuate in Computer Science specializing in software engineering at Cambodia Academy of Digital Technology. Throughout my academic journey, I have developed a strong foundation in software engineering principles and practices. My coursework has equipped me with a solid understanding of Software Development !
